text: haey yeung nung dak chonhching you tde thmr now thngai barlok . dau che neah krob roub nung min trauv ke bambat avei( tongveu robsa ke) b ndi ch laey . haey saumbi vea mean tomngon dauch kreab spai ka yeung noam vea(ampeula ning ampeuaeakrak) mk der . krobkrean haey yeung chea anak chomnoumchomreah
